Amy, Bill and Celine are friends with different ages. Exactly one of the following statements is true.\\
\\
\begin{align*}\text{I.}&\text{ Bill is the oldest.}\\
\text{II.}&\text{ Amy is not the oldest.}\\
\text{III.}&\text{ Celine is not the youngest.}\end{align*}\\
\\
Rank the friends from the oldest to the youngest.\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ \text{Bill, Amy, Celine}\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{Amy, Bill, Celine}\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{Celine, Amy, Bill}\qquad \\
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{Celine, Bill, Amy}\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{Amy, Celine, Bill}$
